meanings.definition: Resembling a bag in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The balloon was baglike as it slowly deflated.
meanings.sent2: The backpack was baglike with its round, bulging shape.
meanings.sent3: The baglike cloud in the sky looked like a giant cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her baglike dress flowed around her like a soft cloud.
meanings.sent5: The baglike pillow was so comfortable, it felt like sleeping on a cloud.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a bag.
meanings.sent1: The baglike purse could hold all her essentials.
meanings.sent2: The baglike container was perfect for storing snacks.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his baglike stomach was always ready for more food.
meanings.sent4: The baglike pockets of his jacket seemed bottomless.
meanings.sent5: The baglike shape of the basket made it easy to carry groceries.

meanings.definition: Designed or shaped like a bag.
meanings.sent1: The baglike tote was ideal for carrying books.
meanings.sent2: The baglike structure of the tent made it easy to pack up.
meanings.sent3: The baglike costume made her look like a walking candy bag.
meanings.sent4: The baglike design of the backpack allowed for easy access.
meanings.sent5: The baglike shape of the hat protected her from the sun.
